summary: An anesthesiologist must awaken her animal instincts when she, her husband and her brother-in-law become the quarry of unseen hunters who want to turn them all into trophies.
cast: Wrenn Schmidt|Pablo Schreiber|Aaron Staton|Cody Saintgnue|Michael Chacon|Nick Saso|Nik
keywords: most dangerous game|human prey|rock climbing|climbing a rock wall|view through rifle scope
title: Supervivencia
